title: KFRJ
text: KFRJ (91.1 <a href="FM%20broadcasting">FM</a>) was a <a href="radio%20station">radio station</a> broadcasting a <a href="Religious%20broadcasting">religious</a> format. Licensed to <a href="China%20Lake%2C%20Kern%20County%2C%20California">China Lake</a>, <a href="California">California</a>, it served the <a href="Ridgecrest%2C%20California">Ridgecrest</a>, <a href="California">California</a> broadcast area. The station was an affiliate of the <a href="Family%20Radio">Family Radio</a> <a href="radio%20network">network</a>, and was owned by <a href="Family%20Stations%2C%20Inc.">Family Stations, Inc.</a> The transmitter was located on El Paso Peak, south of <a href="Ridgecrest%2C%20California">Ridgecrest</a>.
